home.message: This web application is still in constant development.
home.text1: Create your new curriculum quick, easy and free!
home.link_source: Link source code for the project

about.text1: This web application is a social action and will help you to create a professional, elegant and objective curriculum, totally free!
about.text2: Created by a simple boy who even with the difficulties of his daily life, he focused and dedicated his studies to elaborate this project.
about.text3: If you want to help in any way there is
about.credits: All my simple thanks to Google, Github, Heroku and the Firebase project for keeping this project viable and online

notfound.text3: To go back to the beginning

errors.about: It needs to fill with something about you, your goals and abilities.
